mapper.insert: insert into activity (id, name, enable, beginTime, endTime, creatorId, creatorName, tagList, entryFee, totalExpenditure, totalIncome, gmtCreate, gmtModified, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taglist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryfee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalexpenditure,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalincome,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update activity set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creatorId = #{creatorid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creatorName = #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tagList = #{taglist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryFee = #{entryfee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, totalExpenditure = #{totalexpenditure,jdbcType=BIGINT}, totalIncome = #{totalincome,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmtCreate = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmtModified = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, enable, beginTime, endTime, creatorId, creatorName, tagList, entryFee, totalExpenditure, totalIncome, gmtCreate, gmtModified, description from activity where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
